# Qualy

> Qualy is an AI-first inbox for service teams. It unifies WhatsApp, Instagram, and Telegram conversations, automates repetitive replies, and helps teams prioritize high-intent chats.

## LLM Resources

- [Read llms.txt](https://askqualy.com/llms.txt): Short index for AI agents and crawlers.
- [Read llms-full.txt](https://askqualy.com/llms-full.txt): Extended product and FAQ context.
- [Read FAQs.md](https://askqualy.com/faqs.md): Markdown FAQ answers in one file.
- [FAQs Directory](https://askqualy.com/faqs-directory): Human-friendly FAQ index page.

- [Home](https://askqualy.com/)
